General.Name: Focus Lighting and Fixtures Limited
General.Description: Focus Lighting and Fixtures Limited engages in the manufacturing and trading of LED lighting, fixtures, and lighting solutions in India. The company operates through two segments, Own Manufactured and Trading. It offers various focus lights, including recessed adjustable spotlights, recessed downlights, surface mounted spotlights, surface-mounted/suspended downlights, system-based spotlights/wallwasher, track-mounted spotlights, etc. The company also provides cabinet lights and pendants. Its products are used in office, home, hospitality, and infrastructure lightings, as well as in retail industry. Focus Lighting and Fixtures Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: A/I007-1010, Corporate Avenue, Wing A, Mumbai, India, 400063
